ARABIC: وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ ٱعْمَلُوا۟ عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنَّا عَٰمِلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say to those who have no iman: 'Do as you think best. That is what we are doing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say to the infidels. "Act as best you can, we are acting too;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: As for those who are bent on not believing, tell them: 'Work according to your way and we are working according to our way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Tell the unbelievers, "Do as you wish and I will do as I believe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And say to the disbelievers, “Keep on with your works in your places; we are carrying out ours.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And say to those who do not believe: "Act according to your ability and way, We are acting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And say to those who do not believe: Act according to your state; surely we too are acting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: And say to the unbelievers: 'Act you according to your station; we are acting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And say unto those who believe not: Act according to your power. Lo! We (too) are acting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say to those who do not believe, you do things in your way and we are doing things in our way,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And say thou unto those who believe not: work according to your condition verily We, going to work in our way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say to those who do not have faith, ‘Act according to your ability; we too are acting.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say to those who do not believe: "Do what ever ye can: We shall do our part;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And say to those who do not believe: "Act according to your ability and way, We are acting (in our way).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say to those who disbelieve: 'Do according to your station; we are doing according to our station'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And say to those who do not believe, “Act according to your ability; and so will we.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And say to those who do not believe, "Work according to your position; indeed, we are working.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [11:121] And say to those who do not believe: ‘Act according to your ability, [according] to your status, we are acting, according to our status — [this is] a threat for them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And say unto those who believe not) in Allah and the Last Day nor in the revealed Scriptures and prophets: 241 (Act according to your power) in your dwellings act according to your religion so as to destroy me. (Lo! we (too) are acting) to destroy you.
